programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: Unapologetic and free-spirited Inez kidnaps her 6-year-old son, Terry, from the foster care system. They set out to reclaim their sense of home, identity and stability in a rapidly changing New York City.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: A pimp (Terrence Howard) in Memphis, Tenn., sees rap music as the way to escape his dead-end existence and achieve something meaningful.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: A hit man in the Witness Protection Program and his next-door neighbor team up to find out who is trying to kill them.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: Returning to her home planet Pandora, an infamous bounty hunter forms an unexpected alliance with a ragtag team of misfits. Together, they battle alien monsters and dangerous bandits to uncover one of Pandora's most explosive secrets.
